comment.text: This translation key is used to display an error message when a local domain is not supported, typically appearing in a change email dialog or similar interface. The purpose of this text is to inform users that their chosen domain is not compatible for use in this context. It appears on screen as part of the user experience, prompting the user to select a different domain if necessary.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The French translation contains a grammatical error. 'Les domaines local' should be 'Les domaines locaux'. The adjective 'local' needs to agree in gender and number with the noun it modifies ('domaines').
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Les domaines locaux ne sont pas supportés

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Domeniile locale nu sunt acceptate' is not the most natural or accurate rendering of 'Local domains are not supported.' While technically correct, a more idiomatic translation would improve clarity. 'Locale' should likely be 'locale' in Romanian to maintain consistency with the English term, and the phrasing can be refined.

The translation "Псевдодомен верхнего уровня не поддерживается" doesn't precisely convey the meaning of "Local domains are not supported." "Псевдодомен верхнего уровня" (pseudotop-level domain) is too specific and technical. A more accurate and understandable translation would be something like "Локальные домены не поддерживаются" or "Поддержка локальных доменов отсутствует".

The translation 'ස්ථානීය වසම් සඳහා සහාය නොදක්වයි' while understandable, isn't the most natural or precise rendering of 'Local domains are not supported'. A more accurate translation would convey the idea of 'support' being absent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ස්ථානීය වසම් සඳහා සහාය ලබා ගත නොහැක

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '不支持本地域' while technically understandable, doesn't fully capture the nuance of 'Local domains are not supported'. '本地域' focuses on the 'local domain' as a place or area. The original English focuses on the *functionality* of local domains being unavailable.
